2813.name: BANNED_DEVICE_IN_APPLICATION
2813.message:
Online services cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2813.short_description: Your console is permanently banned from this application
2813.long_description: Your console has been permanently banned from this application for breaking the rules.
2813.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get banned
2813.long_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
